body_html:
The problem gets resolved by changing the multiprocessing start method to 'spawn' by calling

import torch.multiprocessing as mp
if __name__ == '__main__':
mp.set_start_method('spawn')

OpenMPI still gives fork warning as before but the code runs fine without any problem.
body_text:
The problem gets resolved by changing the multiprocessing start method to 'spawn' by calling
import torch.multiprocessing as mp
if  __name__ == '__main__':
mp.set_start_method('spawn')
OpenMPI still gives fork warning as before but the code runs fine without any problem.
body:
The problem gets resolved by changing the multiprocessing start method to 'spawn' by calling 

import torch.multiprocessing as mp
if  \_\_name__ == '\_\_main\_\_':
    mp.set_start_method('spawn') 

OpenMPI still gives fork warning as before but the code runs fine without any problem.
